channel.title: Writings from Under the Wattle Tree
channel.description: Recent content on Writings from Under the Wattle Tree

item.title: Introduction
item.description: I’m back home in Brisbane now, maybe until January, maybe longer. Now that I’ve been here for a while, I wanted to start a blog, mainly because Paige suggested it, but also as a Project. There will be journal extracts, musings, and some poetry and story fragments.
